Posts.Content: Panic over it was scar tissue not a lymph node, I ll be like this for year or even forever paranoid/demented. Thanks everyone x x x
Posts.Title: appt today

Posts.Content: Hello I double mastectomy 5 weeks ago ive had right side drained 3 times and left once. Don't know if its just a coincidence but I went to get measured for new bras and started to wear my softies for longer periods and it has nt reoccurred.
Posts.Title: Seroma problems

Posts.Content: Hello Elaine Hope your feeling ok, I would say ask but if you do be prepared to be let down by some people. I was diagnosed in July ive got 3 girls under 4 the youngest being 6 months. Ive just had my 7th chemo im having double mx and lymph clearance in march. To say its been tough is an understatement. Two people inc my x sister in law have really let me down, but people who I thought would nt bother have really helped me. Illness is a funny thing if anything you ll find out who your friends are that's for sure.
Posts.Title: your thoughts please-help should I have to ask or should it be offered...
